SELECT *
FROM (SELECT ah.HEADER_ID AS alertId, 'HEADER' AS alertType, t.TAB_KEY AS tabKey, t.TABNAME AS tabName, ah.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE AS displaySequence, ah.HEADER_NAME AS headerName, ah.HEADER_ID AS headerId, 'None' AS alertName, 1 AS visibilityPenske, 1 AS visibilityVendor, 0 AS templateKey, 'None' AS templateName, ah.HELP_TEXT AS helpText
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERT_HEADER ah, SMC.SMC_TAB_MASTER t
WHERE ah.TAB_ID = t.TAB_ID AND t.DASHBOARD_TAB = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT a.ALERT_ID AS alertId, 'DETAIL' AS alertType, t.TAB_KEY AS tabKey, t.TABNAME AS tabName, a.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE AS displaySequence, ah.HEADER_NAME AS headerName, a.HEADER_ID AS headerId, a.ALERT_NAME AS alertName, a.VISIBILITY_PENSKE AS visibilityPenske, a.VISIBILITY_VENDOR AS visibilityVendor, a.TEMPLATE_KEY AS templateKey, st.TEMPLATE_NAME AS templateName, a.HELP_TEXT AS helpText
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERTS a, SMC.SMC_ALERT_HEADER ah, SMC.SMC_TAB_MASTER t, SMC.SMC_SEARCH_TEMPLATES st
WHERE a.HEADER_ID = ah.HEADER_ID AND ah.TAB_ID = t.TAB_ID AND a.TEMPLATE_ID = st.TEMPLATE_ID AND t.DASHBOARD_TAB = 1) T1
ORDER BY tabKey, headerId, alertType DESC, displaySequence

SELECT TEMPLATE_ID AS templateKey, TEMPLATE_NAME AS templateName
FROM SMC.SMC_SEARCH_TEMPLATES
ORDER BY templateName
